name: Gorilla Golf
description: Use the mouse to drag and shoot the ball, note that this only works when the gorilla is close enough to the ball. Control the movement of the gorilla with A (left), D (right), and W/Space (jump). You can jump off of walls and platforms by pressing W when the gorilla is up against them while jumping. Avoid obstacles (water, cacti) and use platforms (birds) to your advantage!
